languages.text: {n}Сенешаль чуть качается на подогнувшихся ногах, словно вот-вот упадет. Все же ему удается устоять, и пересохшими губами он едва слышно произносит:{/n} "Служу династии фон Валанциус".
{n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль чуть качается на подогнувшихся ногах, словно вот-вот упадет. Все же ему удается устоять, и пересохшими губами он едва слышно произносит:{/n} "Служу династии фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal sways slightly on unsteady legs, as though he's about to fall. He keeps his balance after all, and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}听了你的话，阿贝拉德的身体摇晃起来，仿佛要摔倒在地。到了最后，他终于努力维持着平衡，干裂的嘴唇开了口，你几乎听不到他的声音。{/n}“我始终愿为冯·瓦兰修斯家族服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话，阿贝拉德的身体摇晃起来，仿佛要摔倒在地。到了最后，他终于努力维持着平衡，干裂的嘴唇开了口，你几乎听不到他的声音。{/n}“我始终愿为冯·瓦兰修斯家族服务。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess bekommt etwas wacklige Beine, als würde er gleich umfallen. Er behält jedoch das Gleichgewicht und sagt mit trockenen Lippen und kaum hörbar:{/n} "Ich diene Haus Valancius."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess bekommt etwas wacklige Beine, als würde er gleich umfallen. Er behält jedoch das Gleichgewicht und sagt mit trockenen Lippen und kaum hörbar:{/n} "Ich diene Haus Valancius."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El senescal se tambalea ligeramente, como si las piernas le fallasen y estuviese a punto de caer. Finalmente logra recuperar el equilibrio y habla con un hilillo de voz seca y casi imperceptible.{/n} «Sirvo a la casa von Valancius».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}El senescal se tambalea ligeramente, como si las piernas le fallasen y estuviese a punto de caer. Finalmente logra recuperar el equilibrio y habla con un hilillo de voz seca y casi imperceptible.{/n} «Sirvo a la casa von Valancius».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal chancelle légèrement, comme s'il était sur le point de s'effondrer. Il parvient malgré tout à garder son équilibre et dit sèchement, d'une voix à peine audible :{/n} « Je sers la maison von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal chancelle légèrement, comme s'il était sur le point de s'effondrer. Il parvient malgré tout à garder son équilibre et dit sèchement, d'une voix à peine audible :{/n} « Je sers la maison von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長は、今にも倒れそうな不安定な足取りでわずかにふらつく。最終的に彼はバランスを保ち、乾いた唇で、かろうじて聞こえるほどの声で言う。{/n}「私はフォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕えています」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長は、今にも倒れそうな不安定な足取りでわずかにふらつく。最終的に彼はバランスを保ち、乾いた唇で、かろうじて聞こえるほどの声で言う。{/n}「私はフォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕えています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Düşecekmiş gibi duran Seneşal, titreyen bacaklarının üzerinde sallanıyor. Nihayet dengesini sağladığında kuru dudaklarından dökülen sözler, zar zor duyuluyor.{/n} "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetindeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal wobbles slightly on unsteady legs, as though he is about to fall. He keeps his balance after all and says with dry lips, barely audibly,{/n} "I serve House von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal düşecekmiş gibi titreyen bacaklarının üzerinde sallanıyor. Nihayet dengesini sağlıyor ve kuru dudaklarından dökülen sözler zar zor duyuluyor.{/n} "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetindeyim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
